content: I feel another pillar should be the correlation of Corona drank to NOS used in a movie. What Dom has done for Corona alone is another reason why he’s perfect. And why #1 is ranked #1 is about as much NOS was used is about how many Coronas were drank. In HS and College I would purposely buy Corona, wear all black cut off tees with a fake chain and announce to the party that they could have any beer they want as long as its a Corona. And as a side note if you ever reach for the chicken first, you say grace. AMEN!
